actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend section 6(o) of the Military Service Act of 1967 to exempt from service an individual where such individual's mother's death was service connected.

summary.text: Exempts from military service under the Military Service Act an individual whose mother's death was service-connected. (Amends 50 U.S.C. App. 456(o))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 6(o) of the Military Service Act of 1967 to exempt from service an individual where such individual's mother's death was service connected.
